suggestionData.title: 5-Minute Meditation
suggestionData.description: Start your day with mindful breathing and mental clarity
suggestionData.rationale: Meditation improves focus and creativity, perfect for your music practice

suggestionData.title: Listen to New Music
suggestionData.description: Discover one new song or artist in your genre
suggestionData.rationale: Expanding your musical knowledge will inspire your guitar playing

suggestionData.title: Sketch Product Ideas
suggestionData.description: Draw quick sketches of 3 potential craft products
suggestionData.rationale: Visual brainstorming complements your craft business planning

suggestionData.title: Competitor Analysis
suggestionData.description: Check 2-3 competitors' social media and products
suggestionData.rationale: Builds on your market research habit with deeper competitive insights

suggestionData.title: Morning Stretching
suggestionData.rationale: Prepare your body for exercise and prevent injuries

suggestionData.title: Evening Walk
suggestionData.description: Take a 20-minute walk around your neighborhood
suggestionData.rationale: Low-impact cardio to complement your morning runs

suggestionData.title: Language Flashcards
suggestionData.rationale: Reinforces your vocabulary learning with spaced repetition

suggestionData.title: Watch Language Videos
suggestionData.description: Watch 10 minutes of content in your target language
suggestionData.rationale: Immersion complements your speaking practice perfectly

suggestionData.title: Gratitude Journal
suggestionData.description: Write down 3 things you're grateful for
suggestionData.rationale: Positive mindset enhances creativity and motivation

suggestionData.title: Read Industry News
suggestionData.description: Read 2 articles about your craft industry
suggestionData.rationale: Stay informed about trends affecting your business

suggestionData.title: Protein Shake
suggestionData.description: Make and drink a post-workout protein shake
suggestionData.rationale: Optimize recovery after your strength training

suggestionData.title: Practice Pronunciation
suggestionData.rationale: Audio feedback improves your speaking skills

suggestionData.title: Chord Progression Study
suggestionData.rationale: Expand your musical vocabulary beyond basic chords

suggestionData.title: Customer Feedback Review
suggestionData.description: Check and respond to customer messages/reviews
suggestionData.rationale: Customer engagement builds loyalty and improves products

suggestionData.title: Language Exchange Chat
suggestionData.description: Have a 10-minute conversation with a native speaker
suggestionData.rationale: Real conversation practice is the fastest way to improve
